title: (x) "Egg Harbor" town population sign - Highway Gothic (Interstate) {Jan E}
content:
Looking to find out what font is on my town sign, it has small reflective cirles in the print too. But I think that is just what material they use to print on.

Thanks ya’ll.

author: dwrack

comments.content:
Isn’t that [Highway Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421174801/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/pixymbols/highway-gothic-2002/)?

There’s also [Interstate from Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20080421174801/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/interstate/).
